title: possibly the best champion teaser video ever?

replies.body:
Pretty, damn, amazing.....

Im sure everyones thinking it, but why is that not a whole new game?

aside from the tragically awful voice acting and the fact that it really didn't do anything for me other than to show that warwick stalks his prey it was alright. like the visuals were all good but it really just felt so strange watching it, like fight scenes in something like rogue one. idk man

Noticed some noises when warding a brush. wonder if they have anything to do with this
WWop
Love it, pretty keen on becoming a Warwick main after this hahaha. I guess its time to learn Jungle.

Isn't even a teaser for a champion, just a rework and it beats all the others. Well I guess each one has it's individual feel to it e.g. Jhin's trailer is beautiful, Kled was joyful, Warwick is terrifying. This means that they are trying to scare off the ADC meta.
